    AuthenticationEntryPoint

    This class manages beans that will initialized with development profile
    Employee
    This class represents employees
    EmployeeAlreadyExistException  
    EmployeeHoursFormatterUtil
    This class formats a given hours to a more friendly string Example: EmployeeHoursFormatterUtil.format(0.25) will return 0:15 because 15 minutes are equivalent a 0.25 hours
    EmployeeNewDTO
    A data transfer object for Employee class used to create a new employee
    EmployeeRepository  
    EmployeeResource  
    EmployeeService
    Service responsible for Employee management
    EmployeeWorkDay
    This class groups a set of employee punch clock of a day

    This class is a data transfer object that groups EmployeeWorkDay objects by month

    ObjectNotFoundException

    This class manages beans that will initialized with production profile

    This enum represents User roles of application
    PunchClock

    PunchClockApplication  
    PunchClockRepository  
    PunchClockResource  
    PunchClockRestTime
    This class checks if interval between outDate of working interval and time of employee return is a valid rest time
    PunchClockService
    Service responsible for PunchClock management
    ResourceExceptionHandler
    This class handles exceptions throwned during api requests Every exception handler return a ResponseEntity of StandardError type to give a more friendly error message
    SecurityConfig
    This class configures the security of the application
    StandardError  
    UserDetailsServiceImpl

    UserService  
    WorkingPunchClockInterval
